text: aw ka-alladhi marra ʿala qaryatin wahiya khawiyatun ʿala ʿurushiha qala anna yuh'yi hadhihi l-lahu baʿda mawtiha fa-amatahu l-lahu mi-ata ʿamin thumma baʿathahu qala kam labith'ta qala labith'tu yawman aw baʿda yawmin qala bal labith'ta mi-ata ʿamin fa-unzur ila taʿamika washarabika lam yatasannah wa-unzur ila himarika walinajʿalaka ayatan lilnnasi wa-unzur ila l-ʿizami kayfa nunshizuha thumma naksuha lahman falamma tabayyana lahu qala aʿlamu anna l-laha ʿala kulli shayin qadirun
